description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Brussels Sprouts & Bacon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Brussels sprout,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Pasta With Brussels Sprouts & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta as per packet instructions. Drain, reserving cup of the cooking water.
Meanwhile, heat a large frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook, for 810 minutes, stirring occasionally until crisp and golden. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate.
Add half the oil to same pan, add Brussels sprouts and almonds. Cook over medium heat for 5 minutes, or until sprouts have softened and nuts are browned.

Return bacon to pan, add lemon rind and juice and season with salt and pepper. Add drained pasta, a little of the reserved cooking water and remaining oil and toss to combine. Serve immediately topped with parmesan.
